feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Why this blog exists
entry.content:
This blog is a place to think slowly.

It is not meant to chase trends or publish results as soon as they exist. It is a space to reflect on geospatial data, environmental science, methods, and the questions that appear along the way :)

Some posts will be technical. Others will be reflective. All of them are part of the same process: learning how to look more carefully.
entry.summary: This blog is a place to think slowly
